1370: Ludingus was born in Slyck straet in 1370.
Got married to Rabburgis at age 22 in 1370.
1371: Had a son with Rabburgis, Dilane, at age 23.
1375: Had a son with Rabburgis, Erenboede, at age 27.
1376: Had a daughter with Rabburgis, Iris, at age 28.
Lost daughter Iris when Iris was 1 years old.
1380: Had a daughter with Rabburgis, Reynildis, at age 32.
1381: Had a daughter with Rabburgis, Aghete, at age 33.
1384: Had a son with Rabburgis, Splinter, at age 36.
1385: Had a son with Rabburgis, Ivone, at age 37.
1390: Had a son with Rabburgis, Eltetus, at age 42.
1392: Lost son Splinter when Splinter was 9 years old.
